body:
Just a short question about the whole surface / vertex normal topic... I
guess the normal interpolation is effective only in the direct
calculation, right? So I should not expect too much performance gain
from removing it, only rpict occupying some fewer bytes, right?

Lars.
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] filtering normal information from an obj
subject: [Radiance-general] filtering normal information from an obj
